title: Gabriel DropOut Specials
original_name: ガヴリールドロップアウト OVA
opening_song: "Gabriel Drop Kick (ガヴリールドロップキック)" by Gabriel Tenma White (Miyu Tomita), Vignette Tsukinose April (Saori Oonishi), Satanichia Kurumizawa McDowell (Naomi Oozora), Raphiel Shiraha Ainsworth (Kana Hanazawa)
ending_song: "Hallelujah☆Essaim (ハレルヤ ☆ エッサイム)" by Gabriel Tenma White (Miyu Tomita), Vignette Tsukinose April (Saori Oonishi), Satanichia Kurumizawa McDowell (Naomi Oozora), Raphiel Shiraha Ainsworth (Kana Hanazawa)
sinopse: Specials included with the Blu-ray/DVD release of Gabriel DropOut.
